item.title: Ozone
item.description: Why use parallel processing? The goal of this series of tutorials is to teach ecologists on how to use parallel computing to perform null models. I thus assume that you already know what a null model is. :) Otherwise, there is an excellent book on the subject (Gotelli and Graves, 1996) that is freely available to download here. Why use parallel processing? The simple answer is time. If something takes less time done through parallel processing, why not do it?
